# replacementClass(for:)

**Type Method**

Overridden by subclasses to substitute a custom class for an NSXML class that the parser uses to create node instances.

## Declaration

```swift
class func replacementClass(for cls: AnyClass) -> AnyClass
```

## Parameters

- **cls**: A `Class` object identifying an NSXML class that is to be replaced by your custom class.

## Return Value

The substituted class.

## Discussion

For example, if you have a custom subclass of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLElement] that you want to be used in place of `NSXMLElement`, you would make the following override:

```objc
+ (Class)replacementClassForClass:(Class)currentClass {
    if ( currentClass == [NSXMLElement class] ) {
        return [MyCustomElementClass class];
    }
}
```

This method is invoked before a document is parsed. The substituted class must be a subclass of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode], `NSXMLDocument`, `NSXMLElement`, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTD], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTDNode].
